scenarios.name: Real-time claim status updates
scenarios.description: As a customer, I want to view the real-time status of my insurance claim.
scenarios.steps:
Given I am logged into my account
When I navigate to the claims tracking section
Then I should see the current status of my claim

scenarios.name: Access related documents
scenarios.description: As a customer, I want to access documents related to my insurance claim.
scenarios.steps:
Given I am viewing my insurance claim details
When I click on the 'Related Documents' section
Then I should see all documents associated with my claim

scenarios.name: Direct communication with insurer
scenarios.description: As a customer, I want to be able to communicate directly with my insurer about my claim.
scenarios.steps:
Given I am viewing my claim details
When I click on 'Contact Insurer'
Then I should be able to send a message directly to my insurer
